attributes.action: That the Leveson Enquiry be Abolished
attributes.additional_details:
The Leveson Enquiry is an Unelected, Severely Politically  Biased and Unrepresentative Body and should be abolished forthwith. It is composed of people who are against thE publice disclosure of sensitive material and as such would severely hinder democracy and the free will of the British People. I call upon all, you who have signed the opposite petition to rethink your stand because you obviously do not know what this highly suspect and dubious body want to do.
ABOLISH IT NOW !
DO NOT SIGN THE LEVESON Enquiry Petition !!!
You will, be throwing away your Freedom of Speech !
